testcase.classname: F1_Register| users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: Guest user could register with new accounts
testcase.system-out: Given user is navigating to register page...................................passed When user is selecting gender type.........................................passed And user is entering firstName "automation" and lastName "tester"...........passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test@example.com" field...............................passed And user enter company name "MicroSoft".....................................passed And user fills password fields "P@sswOrd" and "P@sswOrd"....................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed And the color is as specified...............................................passed

testcase.classname: users could use login functionality to use their accounts.

testcase.classname: users could use login functionality to use their accounts.

testcase.classname: the sliders on the homepage are clickable and direct user to the right page

failure.message: The following asserts failed: user directed to wrong page expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020]

testcase.failure:
